Description: Sycomore fig wood stela of Besenmut: this round-topped stela is divided into three sections. At the top is a curved sky-sign above a winged sun-disk with pendent uraei. The top and middle registers are divided by a multi-coloured border. The middle register comprises two scenes back to back under a sky-sign. On the right Besenmut in a leopard-skin over a white skirt adores Ra-Horakhty, who stands behind an altar on which rests a water-pot cooled by a lotus-blossom. On the left the deceased adores Atum who stands behind a similar altar. The third section of the stela consists of six lines of text divided in the middle into a prayer to Ra-Harakhty on the right and a prayer to Atum on the left on behalf of the prophet of Montu, Besenmut, son of the prophet of Montu Nespasefy and the lady Irtyru. The stela is cracked part way down the front and damaged on the top left side. The edges are chipped with loss to some text. The background of the stela is white. The sky-sign at the top is blue. The disk is red with pink uraei who have blue heads and a red and white crown edged in black respectively. The upper wings are blue with a pink patch streaked in blue; while the lower wings are green edged in red. The hieroglyphs are blue and red. There is a large multicoloured border consisting of green, pink, blue, and red rectangles separated by two white and one black stripe and edged in green. In the middle register the sky-sign is blue and the hieroglyphs are black on a pink background separated by blue lines. The human figures have a red body, black eye on white, blue wig with red cone and fillet, white kilt with black edges and details and green belt, green collar, and pink leopard-skin with black dots. The altars and pots are pink, edged in black. The lotuses have green stems, pink bases, and green, blue, and white flowers. The gods have red bodies, white kilts, green upper garments, collars, and sceptres, black ankh-signs, brown belts, and black and green tails. The face of Ra-Horakhty is white with black features and green outer eye. His wig is blue, and his disk red with a green uraeus. Atum has a red face with black beard, black eye on white, and red and white crown. The hieroglyphs at the bottom are black on the white background between blue lines. The two texts are separated by a black vertical line down the centre. The back and sides have been plastered.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Cache of the Priests of Montu (Thebes)
